title: Lee Sin Goku Skin

replies.body:
you can get a custom one. Its not too hard to install only thing is that your the only one who can see it.
Plus if they made it a goku skin, they would be infringing on copyrights.{{champion:64}}

I did mentioned that I already knew there was a custom one :P Yeah I know, maybe they could pay them or ask them to use it. Then make there money back + More from selling the skin. It would just be soooo cool! :(
or maybe even just rip it off and call it something different like they did with scizor/scyther and Kha'zix{{champion:121}}
